f3716.value: engaged incrude oil exploration, development and production principally in the Republic of Tatarstan (“Tatarstan”), a republic within  the  Russian  Federation.  The  Group  also  engages  in  refining  of  crude  oil  and  associated  petroleum  gas processing, marketing of crude oil and refined products as well as production and marketing of tires and banking activities
